verses.verse: Now <WG1161> there were <WG2258> in <WG2596> the church <WG1577> that was <WG5607> at <WG1722> Antioch <WG490> certain <WG5100> prophets <WG4396> and <WG2532> teachers <WG1320>; as <WG5037> Barnabas <WG921>, and <WG2532> Simeon <WG4826> that was called <WG2564> Niger <WG3526>, and <WG2532> Lucius <WG3066> of Cyrene <WG2956>, and <WG5037> Manaen <WG3127>, which had been brought up with <WG4939> Herod <WG2264> the tetrarch <WG5076>, and <WG2532> Saul <WG4569>.

As <WG1161> they <WG846> ministered <WG3008> to the Lord <WG2962>, and <WG2532> fasted <WG3522>, the Holy <WG40> Spirit <WG4151> said <WG2036>, Separate <WG873> me <WG3427> Barnabas <WG921> and <WG2532> Saul <WG4569> for <WG1519> the work <WG2041> to which <WG3739> I have called <WG4341> them <WG5037>.
And when <WG5119> they had fasted <WG3522> and <WG2532> prayed <WG4336>, and <WG2532> laid <WG2007> their hands <WG5495> on them <WG846>, they sent <WG630> them away <WG630>.

So <WG3303> <WG99999> they <WG3778>, being sent forth <WG1599> by <WG5259> the Holy <WG40> Spirit <WG4151>, departed <WG2718> unto <WG1519> Seleucia <WG4581>; and <WG5037> from there <WG1564> they sailed <WG636> to <WG1519> Cyprus <WG2954>.

And <WG2532> when they were <WG1096> at <WG1722> Salamis <WG4529>, they preached <WG2605> the word <WG3056> of God <WG2316> in <WG1722> the synagogues <WG4864> of the Jews <WG2453>: and <WG1161> they had <WG2192> also <WG2532> John <WG2491> to their minister <WG5257>.

And <WG1161> when they had gone through <WG1330> the isle <WG3520> unto <WG891> Paphos <WG3974>, they found <WG2147> a certain <WG5100> sorcerer <WG3097>, a false prophet <WG5578>, a Jew <WG2453>, whose <WG3739> name <WG3686> was Bar-jesus <WG919>:

Which <WG3739> was <WG2258> with <WG4862> the deputy of the country <WG446>, Sergius <WG4588> Paulus <WG3972>, a prudent <WG4908> man <WG435>; who <WG3778> called for <WG4341> Barnabas <WG921> and <WG2532> Saul <WG4569>, and desired <WG1934> to hear <WG191> the word <WG3056> of God <WG2316>.

But <WG1161> Elymas <WG1681> the sorcerer <WG3097> (for <WG1063> so <WG3779> is <WG3177> his <WG846> name <WG3686> by interpretation <WG3177>) withstood <WG436> them <WG846>, seeking <WG2212> to turn away <WG1294> the proconsul <WG446> from <WG575> the faith <WG4102>.
Then <WG1161> Saul <WG4569>, (who <WG3588> also <WG2532> is called Paul <WG3972>,) filled with <WG4130> the Holy <WG40> Spirit <WG4151>, set his eyes <WG816> on <WG1519> him <WG2532>,

And said <WG2036>, O <WG5599> full <WG4134> of all <WG3956> subtly <WG1388> and <WG2532> all <WG3956> mischief <WG4468>, you child <WG5207> of the devil <WG1228>, you enemy <WG2190> of all <WG3956> righteousness <WG1343>, will you <WG3973> not <WG3756> cease <WG3973> to pervert <WG1294> the right <WG2117> ways <WG3598> of the Lord <WG2962>?

And <WG2532> now <WG3568>, behold <WG2400>, the hand <WG5495> of the Lord <WG2962> is upon <WG1909> you <WG4571>, and <WG2532> you shall be <WG2071> blind <WG5185>, not <WG3361> seeing <WG991> the sun <WG2246> for <WG891> a season <WG2540>. And <WG1161> immediately <WG3916> there fell <WG1968> on <WG1909> him <WG846> a mist <WG887> and <WG2532> a darkness <WG4655>; and <WG2532> he went about <WG4013> seeking <WG2212> some to lead him by the hand <WG5497>.
Then <WG5119> the proconsul <WG446>, when he saw <WG1492> what was done <WG1096>, believed <WG4100>, being astonished <WG1605> at <WG1909> the teaching <WG1322> of the Lord <WG2962>.

Now when <WG1161> Paul <WG3972> and his company <WG4012> sailed <WG321> from <WG575> Paphos <WG3974>, they came <WG2064> to <WG1519> Perga <WG4011> in Pamphylia <WG3828>: and <WG1161> John <WG2491> departing <WG672> from <WG575> them <WG846> returned <WG5290> to <WG1519> Jerusalem <WG2414>.

Then <WG1161> Paul <WG3972> stood up <WG450>, and <WG2532> beckoning with <WG2678> his hand <WG5495> said <WG2036>, Men <WG435> of Israel <WG2475>, and <WG2532> you that fear <WG5399> God <WG2316>, give audience <WG191>.

The God <WG2316> of this <WG5127> people <WG2992> of Israel <WG2474> chose <WG1586> our <WG2257> fathers <WG3962>, and <WG2532> exalted <WG5312> the people <WG2992> when <WG1722> they lived as strangers <WG3940> in <WG1722> the land <WG1093> of Egypt <WG125>, and <WG2532> with <WG3326> a high <WG5308> arm <WG1023> brought he <WG1806> them <WG846> out <WG1537> of it <WG846>.

And afterward <WG2547> they desired <WG154> a king <WG935>: and <WG2532> God <WG2316> gave <WG1325> unto them <WG846> Saul <WG4549> the son <WG5207> of Cis <WG2797>, a man <WG435> of <WG1537> the tribe <WG5443> of Benjamin <WG958>, for the space of forty <WG5062> years <WG2094>.

And <WG2532> when he had removed <WG3179> him <WG846>, he raised up <WG1453> to them <WG846> David <WG1138> to be <WG1519> their king <WG935>; to whom <WG3739> also <WG2532> he gave testimony <WG3140>, and said <WG2036>, I have found <WG2147> David <WG1138> the <WG3588> son of Jesse <WG2421>, a man <WG435> after <WG2596> my own <WG3450> heart <WG2588>, which <WG3739> shall fulfill <WG4160> all <WG3956> my <WG3450> will <WG2307>.
Of <WG575> this man <WG5127>'s seed <WG4690> has <WG1453> God <WG2316> according to <WG2596> his promise <WG1860> raised <WG1453> to Israel <WG2474> a Savior <WG4990>, Jesus <WG2424>:

When <WG4296> John <WG2491> had first preached <WG4296> before <WG4253> <WG99999> his <WG846> coming <WG1529> the baptism <WG908> of repentance <WG3341> to all <WG3956> the people <WG2992> of Israel <WG2474>.

And <WG1161> as <WG5613> John <WG2491> fulfilled <WG4137> his course <WG1408>, he said <WG3004>, Whom <WG5101> think you that <WG5282> I <WG3165> am <WG1511>? I <WG1473> am <WG1510> not <WG3756> he <WG235>. But, behold <WG2400>, there comes one <WG2064> after <WG3326> me <WG1691>, whose <WG3739> shoes <WG5266> of <WG4228> his feet <WG4228> I am <WG1510> not <WG3756> worthy <WG514> to loose <WG3089>.

Men <WG435> and brothers <WG80>, sons <WG5207> of the stock <WG1085> of Abraham <WG11>, and <WG2532> whoever <WG3588> among <WG1722> you <WG5213> fears <WG5399> God <WG2316>, to you <WG5213> is <WG649> the word <WG3056> of this <WG3778> salvation <WG4991> sent <WG649>.

For <WG1063> they that live <WG2730> at <WG1722> Jerusalem <WG2419>, and <WG2532> their <WG846> rulers <WG758>, because they knew <WG50> him <WG5126> not <WG50>, nor yet <WG2532> the voices <WG5456> of the prophets <WG4396> which <WG3588> are read <WG314> every <WG3956> <WG99999> sabbath day <WG4521>, they have fulfilled <WG4137> them in condemning him <WG2919>.
And <WG2532> though they found <WG2147> no <WG3367> cause <WG156> of death <WG2288> in him <WG154>, yet they asked Pilate <WG4091> to have him <WG846> slain <WG337>.

And <WG1161> when <WG5613> they had fulfilled <WG5055> all <WG537> that was written <WG1125> of <WG4012> him <WG846>, they took <WG2507> him down <WG2507> from <WG575> the tree <WG3586>, and laid <WG5087> him in <WG1519> a tomb <WG3419>.

But <WG1161> he <WG3739>, whom God <WG2316> raised again <WG1453>, saw <WG1492> no <WG3756> corruption <WG1312>.

And <WG1161> when <WG1826> the Jews <WG2453> had gone <WG1826> out of <WG1537> the synagogue <WG4864>, the Gentiles <WG1484> begged <WG3870> that these <WG5023> words <WG4487> might be preached <WG2980> to them <WG846> <WG99999> the next <WG3342> sabbath <WG4521>.

Now <WG1161> when <WG3089> the congregation <WG4864> was broken up <WG3089>, many <WG4183> of the Jews <WG2453> and <WG2532> religious <WG4576> proselytes <WG4339> followed <WG190> Paul <WG3972> and <WG2532> Barnabas <WG921>: who <WG3748>, speaking <WG4354> to them <WG846>, persuaded <WG3982> them <WG846> to continue in <WG1961> the grace <WG5485> of God <WG2316>.
